name: Dogs Memes For Safety
description:
A game for Ludum Dare 47 "Stuck in a loop" Jam.

SAVE THE HUMAN!

Delay the execution of the “open door” loop until the forgetful human is wearing their helmet

Controls:

W - Accelerate

A/D - Movement from side to side

Esc - Go back to main menu

inspired by: 

music & sfx:
https://opengameart.org/content/neocrey-droid-glitch
https://opengameart.org/content/sci-fi-sound-effects-library
